name: Cappuccino Muffins with Chocolate and Cranberries
author: DULCINEA54935
summary: Modified from a recipe in a coffeehouse series mystery. You may add a frosting or glaze, but these are sweet enough on their own.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper liners
Gently stir flour, baking powder, baking soda, cocoa powder, salt, chocolate chips, dried cranberries, and orange zest in a bowl until thoroughly combined
Beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, sour cream, milk, and eggs with an electric mixer on medium speed in a separate large mixing bowl until blended
Gently stir flour mixture into the liquid ingredients just until batter is moistened and smooth
Dissolve coffee granules in water in a small bowl and stir coffee mixture into the batter
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups, filling them about 3/4 full
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned and a toothpick inserted into the middle of a muffin, 20 to 25 minutes
